attributes.action: give some kind of annual funding to the RNLI
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As an emergency service that many people throughout Britain rely on, i am asking the government provide some kind of annual funding.
This service is all voluntary and they risk their own lives for others.
If you are not already aware it can cost around £5000 to send a boat out on one life saving journey.
This money again relies on people giving  voluntary charitable contributions.
If on just one occasion someone from the government was to need help out at sea, they would rely on this service, yet if  the money wasn't available for the RNLI to go out on a rescue, what would that person do.
I'm sure they would think twice about funding of this wonderful emergency service, who so many of us do and may yet require to rely on.
I am therefore asking for you all to get behind this petition and help all those that help us.
